title: I rode a giant mechanical elephant. You can too.
description:
Les machines de l'île, in Nantes, are famous for their giant mechanical elephant. And to my surprise, tourists can just pay and ride it. ■ More information: https://www.lesmachines-nantes.fr/

Edited by Michelle Martin https://twitter.com/mrsmmartin
Camera: Guillaume Juin https://www.guillaumejuin.fr
Producer: Axel Zeiliger at Block8 https://block8production.com

Thanks to Jérémie Chabot for the suggestion

I'm at https://tomscott.com
on Twitter at https://twitter.com/tomscott
on Facebook at https://facebook.com/tomscott
and on Instagram as tomscottgo
